import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const NavBar = ({ status }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const logout = () => { localStorage.clear(); navigate("/login"); alert(`Logout Successful!`); }; return ( <>
iBank
{status ? (
  • Home
  • Deposit
  • Withdraw
  • Balance
) : (
  • Home
  • Login
  • Create Account
)}
); }; export default NavBar;
